author: gudrutis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR should fix like this issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/issues/1151
The issue is that the current format sometimes produces really long filenames which igProf cannot open, thus we are missing some steps.

#### PR validation:

Tested locally by running `runTheMatrix.py -i all -l 136.731 --command '-n 1 --profile pp' --ibeos` on latest CMSSW enviroment.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
Not a backport.
title: Change profiler format for igprof
